question: Which country ranked the happiest country in the world, according to the World Happiness Report of 2019?
explanation: Finland ranked the happiest country in the world, according to the World Happiness Report of 2019. World Happiness Report is an annual publication of the United Nations Sustainable Development Solutions Network. This report ranks countries on six key variables that support well-being: income, freedom, trust, healthy life expectancy, social support, and generosity.
